name: inColor - Coloring & Drawing
description:
It's Time to Meet Your Inner Artist!

Tons of Exquisite Coloring Pages, Updated Everyday
New free coloring pictures will be updated EVERYDAY!
Perfect way of relaxing, releasing pressure and getting inner peace ~
Mandalas, Animals, Birds, Flowers, Butterflies, People, Cartoon …and more surprise for you.

Various Interesting Coloring Tools
Realistic coloring brushes that simulate the paper experience
Drawing brushes, gradient overlay…bring more joy into your life!
Custom colors : combine any paint colors you like, enjoy more personalized coloring and paint matchless works of art;

Import, Take Photos to Coloring
Color your most memorable photo!
Import any pictures to coloring, take a photo or import from gallery
You can do anything if you like in InColor !

Self-Creation: You Can Draw Freely Your Imaginations
Create your own mandala
Create Pixel Arts
And unleash your creativity while drawing freely and coloring it!

Art Community For Showing
Explore beautiful works of art made by numerous members of the art community
Publish your own works (mandalas, portraits, etc) to inspire others!

Release the stress and feel better. Time to Bring Art into Your Life.
